transcript:
Customer: Hello usme ye hota hai ki na usko queries jyada aati hai wo depend karta hai uske

Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ha boliye

Executive: Hi ma'am good afternoon

Customer: Hi good afternoon

Executive: Ma'am wo buyleads pe thoda discuss karna tha kal wo meeting mein discuss ho nahi paya na

Customer: Ha ha abhi to I guess koi bhi nahi hai

Executive: Wo kal baat kar rahi thi na aapse wo nahi hai aaj

Customer: Ji

Executive: Wo nahi hai aaj

Customer: Ha wo nahi hai aaj

Executive: To ye number to aapke paas hai na

Customer: Kya?

Executive: I think aap bhi IndiaMART services handle karte ho right?

Customer: Kal aapse baat kar rahi thi na wo ladki wo aaj nahi hai aur kaam hai aaj jyada isliye

Executive: Main aapko free hone ke baad call karu?

Customer: Kitne din ke baad?

Executive: Order hai aaj isliye kal baat kar lenge

Customer: Ma'am ye call important hai main aapko ye bata deti hu theek hai this is important that's why I am calling you again and again

Customer: Okay

Executive: To aap aapke business pe effect dalegi ye cheez right aur jitna bhi order karoge

Customer: Ha malum hai hum

Executive: Main aaj ek hi karti hu aur order bhi jyada hai isliye main aapko bol rahi hu ma'am 10 minutes ki kar paoge aap kabhi bhi beech mein lunch mein possible ho to

Customer: Theek hai to aap mujhe lunch ka time de dijiye 10 minutes ke liye connect kar lena bas main aapko thoda bata dungi kaise kahan se aap isko remove kar sakte ho bas wo aapko jo aapne kaha tha na location other locations ki buyleads aapko show ho rahi hai right

To wo location kahan se kis tarah remove kar sakte ho aap wo main aapko guide kar dungi so that aapko buyleads show hona start ho jaye uske liye bas mujhe five to 10 minutes chahiye aapke

Customer: Wo location ke bare mein humko madam se bolna padega humko madam ne kuch bola hi nahi wo madam ko bahar out of Goa se order bhi chahiye honge na

Executive: Out of Goa ki buyleads chahiye ya nahi chahiye ye bataiye

Customer: Wo humko confirm karna hai madam se

Executive: Ma'am to kal hi unhone mujhe kaha tha ki unko sirf Goa ki chahiye Goa location ki hi chahiye only right

Customer: Theek hai theek hai

Executive: To unhone mujhe kal kaha tha ki unko sirf Goa ki hi buyleads chahiye sirf theek hai to agar only Goa ki buyleads chahiye because to inki jo profile hai profile pe other location bhi added hai theek hai that's why buylead aapko sahi se nahi aa rahi hai to main sirf aur sirf Goa ki hi location aapse select karwaungi iske liye main aapko keh rahi hu five to 10 minutes aap mujhe de dena lunch mein jyada time nahi lagega

Customer: Lekin humko confirm karna hai madam se hum aise bhi kuch nahi kar sakte na

Executive: Okay no problem aap unse ek bar baat kar lo ha wahi bol rahe ho baat kar lo discuss karke aap mujhe isi same number pe call back kar lena theek hai aur bas 10 minutes ka ma'am time nikal do please kyuki ye aapke profile ke liye important hai

Customer: Ha malum hai

Executive: Ha bilkul theek hai so that main aapko kuch guide kar dungi acche se okay

Customer: Ha theek hai

Executive: Okay ma'am aap mera ye number save kar lijiye Meenakshi Sharma naam se

Customer: Ha save hai

Executive: Okay ma'am okay call back kar lijiyega aap mujhe

Customer: Time lagega madam bahar gaye hue hai

Executive: Bahar gaye ho ma'am

Customer: Ha

Executive: To ma'am se actually meri direct ma'am se bhi baat hui thi pehle main aapko ye bhi bata du theek hai unhone mujhe kaha tha ki unko sirf Goa ki hi buyleads chahiye only Goa location to aap bol rahe the kal kal nahi kal se pehle bhi meri unse baat hui October mein October mein discuss hua tha mera unse ye jo 557 number hai na

Customer: Ha bolti hu par wo staff bol raha tha madam

Executive: Ma'am is number pe baat nahi hui thi jo 557 last mein number hai na jo primary number unse puchti hu confirm karke aapko batati hu

Executive: Ha bilkul hai na aap unse ek bar confirm karke please do minute lagenge call pe puch lena theek hai meri bhi unse baat hui hai pehle aap unko bol dena mera number hai unke paas mam ke paas

Customer: Ha

Executive: Okay okay to aap mujhe call kab tak kar doge bata doge aap mujhe ek bar kyuki main aapko ye bata du ki do se teen mera lunch rehta hai to 3 o clock ke baad aap mujhe call kar lena ek bar theek hai ma'am

Customer: Main aapko 4 baje karte hai call

Executive: Theek hai ma'am main wait karungi 4 baje theek hai ha theek hai aur yahan yahan pe ma'am ek aur cheez main aapko bata deti hu theek hai aapke kuch product aise hain ki jinme primary category mein aap nahi hai matlab primary product added nahi honge to usse related searches nahi aayengi wo bhi main aapko ek bar video meeting mein bata dungi

Customer: Theek hai

Executive: Kuch product aise hain ma'am jinki na category mentioned nahi hai theek hai to wo bhi main aapko

Customer: Aawaz nahi aa rahi aapki

Executive: Aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri

Customer: Fir se bolo

Executive: Hello ma'am main ye keh rahi hu kuch aapki profile mein kuch aapke catalog mein aise product hain jinki category mentioned nahi hai to aapko jo bhi buylead aati hai na wo category search pe hi aati hai product search pe right to ek bar main aapko wo bhi dikha dungi aap wo bhi correct karwa dena aaj so that aapko dekho buyleads sahi tarike se aana start ho jaye otherwise aapko koi benefit nahi milega isse

Customer: Ha theek hai theek hai

Executive: Okay okay ma'am call back kar lena

Customer: Ha theek hai

Executive: Okay ma'am thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving buyleads from wrong locations.

- Customer needs to confirm location preference with manager.

- Some of the customer's products lack primary category.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide on location removal.

- Executive will explain primary category importance.

- Executive asked for 5-10 minutes during lunch.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after confirming with manager.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, category, profile
